New Records: Gill and Jaiswal equalled the record for the second highest opening alliance for India in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Gill and Jaiswal stitched opening stand of 165 runs.
Others: The West Indies essay revolved around two partnerships - a 49 for the fifth wicket between Hope and Hetmyer and then a 47 for the eighth wicket between Hetmyer and Odean Smith.
